name: Troll Physics
description:
Play through 16 levels of unadulterated DEMO in Troll Physics, the precision platformer that bites back!

Features:

  • Responsive controls, WASD and arrow keys
  • 16 levels and growing (50+ planned)
  • I don't know anymore man...

Controls:

WASD/arrow keysMovement/jumpRReset to level 1
